introduction: The film Leave me alone… is the story of an initiation, a sort of "Bildungsroman".An hospitable traveller experiences hospitality with the people who don’t enjoy it, or so rarely : the wanderers, the fools, the homeless.But with them he’ll learn that it has to be done in the right way. In the country where the rituals are an evidence, where how to do something is more important than to do it : Japan.
